page.title: 02Leisure Activities
page.content: The most popular toys are home computers and elctronic games, "B.M.X." bicycles, which are very sturdy, tough stunt bikes used on street corners. Little furry toys and small plastic figures modelled on T.V. characters are very popular. In the playground at the moment the children enjoy playing with coloured glass marbles. Children and adults spend a large proportion of their lives watching television with recorded programmes and films becoming increasingly popular. Many cars have radio and cassette players. Pop music is a large and national industry and young people buy many records and tapes. Break dancing is popular though in Bradford-on-Avon current trends are not so obvious. Sport is popular, particulary football, swimming and fishing.{
